      • LinearInterpolation

        public LinearInterpolation(double p0,
                           double p1)
        Creates a linear interpolation from p0 to p1. The total time is 1 second.
        Parameters:
        p0 - The initial position.
        p1 - The final position.

      • LinearInterpolation

                           double p1,
                           double totalTime)
        Creates a linear interpolation from p0 to p1.
        Parameters:
        p0 - The initial position.
        p1 - The final position.
        totalTime - The total time of the spline.
